properties.name: Elegant Villa with a View
properties.description: Luxurious 4-bedroom villa with panoramic ocean view, exquisite interiors, and a spacious garden.

properties.name: Cozy Family Home
properties.description: Charming 3-bedroom family home in a quiet neighborhood with a large backyard and modern kitchen.

properties.name: Downtown Condo
properties.description: Stylish 2-bedroom condo in the heart of the city, close to all amenities and public transportation.

properties.name: Seaside Retreat
properties.description: Spacious 5-bedroom beachfront property with a private pool, direct beach access, and stunning sunsets.

properties.name: Modern Urban Loft
properties.description: 2-bedroom loft in a trendy urban neighborhood with open concept design, exposed brick walls, and city views.

properties.name: Rural Farmhouse
properties.description: 3-bedroom farmhouse on a serene countryside with a large garden, barn, and peaceful surroundings.

properties.name: Mountain Cabin Getaway
properties.description: Cozy 2-bedroom mountain cabin with a fireplace, mountain views, and close to hiking trails.

properties.name: Golf Course Villa
properties.description: Spacious 6-bedroom villa overlooking a golf course, with a private pool and lush landscaping.

properties.name: Historic Townhouse

properties.name: Lakefront Cottage
properties.description: Quaint 1-bedroom cottage on a peaceful lakefront with a private dock, perfect for a weekend getaway.
